[DQC.US.0164.10090] A value of 10,000,000 is reported for the concept us-gaap:BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderationLiability with the BalanceSheetLocationAxis. This concept should not be disaggregated using the BalanceSheetLocationAxis. Instead the FairValueByLiabilityClassAxis should be used with the member us-gaap:OtherNoncurrentLiabilitiesMember.
The properties of this us-gaap:BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderationLiability fact are:
Period :2021-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementFrequencyAxis=us-gaap:FairValueMeasurementsRecurringMember, us-gaap:FairValueByLiabilityClassAxis=us-gaap:LiabilityMember, us-gaap:BalanceSheetLocationAxis=us-gaap:OtherNoncurrentLiabilitiesMember Unit : USD
